review: This is a great idea, but it doesn't work for me.  Our internet isn't the problem as we have a smart tv and amazon prime videos and netflix stream perfectly; this only works half the time.  We have to unplug it to restart it every day and it maybe improves the video quality temporarily.  I don't know if it's our geographic location in South Dakota or if it is a bad device.  Either way, I wouldn't recommend it.

review: Great tool but slow right out the box. Every move you make with the remote control has a 1-2 second delay. If it was faster would give it 5 stars.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I decided to order the amazon fire stick as an early father's day present for my husband (he really wants the tv, but  this was as close as I could get lol!). We had gotten rid of cable about a year ago and simply stream television through our ps3. Unfortunately, our ps3 has been nearly depleted from use (we also used it for our movies for the kids). I decided to check out the different fire devices available and after reading some reviews and asking hubs what he thought of it, I bought it. We have been pretty happy with it so far. The only issue is when attempting to watch anything on hulu, it pauses CONSTANTLY! it is really irritating! I am still researching the issue. With everything else (Netflix, Amazon Prime TV) I am very pleased with it and my husband likes it too :) I would definitely recommend it, just be prepared to have hulu pause a lot if you use it (If I find a solution I will post it).
author: Firefightingmama14
